attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LcloeV352Gzxj8Lf2C7_desc
attribs.current: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 14 (4d6) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't incapacitated.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LcloeV8dx4tZ9Zh-4Zk_description
attribs.current: The hobgoblin makes three melee attacks. Alternatively, it can make two ranged attacks with its javelins.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LcloeVNP-8ZAzU0U5Iv_description
attribs.current: If the target is Large or smaller, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LcloeVYtWIb9bsfco9m_attack_tohitrange
attribs.current: +9, Range 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft.,  one target

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LcloeVh5OZ1Y89oRVKm_name
attribs.current: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LcloeVh5OZ1Y89oRVKm_name_display
attribs.current: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LcloeVh5OZ1Y89oRVKm_description
attribs.current: For 1 minute, the hobgoblin can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the hobgoblin. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the hobgoblin is incapacitated.

attribs.name: repeating_npcreaction_-LcloeVl3eOAagG3eLEk_desc
attribs.current: The hobgoblin adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the hobgoblin must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

attribs.name: repeating_npcreaction_-LcloeVl3eOAagG3eLEk_description
attribs.current: The hobgoblin adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the hobgoblin must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

abilities.name: 4: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
